A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I have never been so disappointed by a Star Wars film.. I love the franchise and the ledgands extended universe. This film has destroyed any hope for it. 

Snoke wtf

Kylo wtf

Knights of the Ren wtf

Luke wtf

Rey wtf

EVERYTHING WTF...

So many missed opportunities to create an amazing addition to the franchise. The attempt at the humor in this film was cringe worthy and every time they tried to be funny just took me out of the world. 
This was the least starwars feeling movie ever.
